svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Agricultural water withdrawals vs. GDP per capita, 2012
Share of total water withdrawals (which is the sum of water withdrawals for agriculture, industrial and domestic uses)
used in agriculture versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita, measured in 2011 international-$. Agricultural
water withdrawal is defined as self-supplied water withdrawn for irrigation, livestock and aquaculture purposes.
Annual freshwater withdrawals, agriculture (% of total freshwater
Source: UN Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO) AQUASTAT; World Bank - World Development Indicators
